# ciscosecureaccess_destination_list (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "ciscosecureaccess_destination_list" "test_dl1" {
    name = "TF Dest List A"
    destinations = [
      {
        comment = "Second warning url managed by TF"
        type = "ipv4"
        destination = "127.0.0.2"
      },
      {
        comment = "First warning url managed by TF"
        type = "domain"
        destination = "warn.foo.bar"
      },
      {
        comment = "Second warning url managed by TF"
        type = "url"
        destination = "http://foo.bar/blockwarn"
      }
    ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of destination list

### Optional

- `destinations` (Attributes Set) List of destinations to include in the list (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--destinations))

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Unique identifier for destination list

<a id="nestedatt--destinations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `destinations`

Required:

- `destination` (String) A domain, URL, or IP.
- `type` (String) The type of the destination ('DOMAIN', 'URL', 'IPV4')

Optional:

- `comment` (String) Description of destination

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for destination
